verses.name: Leviticus 11:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses and to Aaron, saying unto them,

verses.name: Leviticus 11:2
verses.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, These are the beasts which ye shall eat among all the beasts that are on the earth.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:3
verses.text: Whatsoever parteth the hoof, and is clovenfooted, and cheweth the cud, among the beasts, that shall ye eat.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:4
verses.text: Nevertheless these shall ye not eat of them that chew the cud, or of them that divide the hoof: as the camel, because he cheweth the cud, but divideth not the hoof; he is unclean unto you.
